name: Bio-Boost / Bio-Boost Plus

name: HCG / Gonadorelin
instructions: 1. Grab your supplies (see image below) 2. (For first-time use only) This product is lyophilized, which means it arrives in powder form and you must reconstitute it using bacteriostatic water. Once this is complete, the vial will be ready to use for the remainder of the vial. Please click here for Reconstitution Instructions. This is also shown in the main HCG / Gonadorelin instruction video. 3. Draw the prescribed medication amount - click here for a list of your medications. 4. Inject drawn medications subcutaneously.

(For first-time use only) This product is lyophilized, which means it arrives in powder form and you must reconstitute it using bacteriostatic water. Once this is complete, the vial will be ready to use for the remainder of the vial. Please click here for Reconstitution Instructions. This is also shown in the main Methylcobalamin (B-12)s instruction video. 3. Draw the prescribed medication amount - click here for a list of your medications. 4. Inject drawn medications subcutaneously.
